quote: My life was pouring out my feet and seeping through cracks in the floor; yet still I knelt and did not move, for fear she'd let go my hands. Let me stay, I wanted to beg: Please don't make me go.
quote_letters: MY LIFE WAS POURING OUT MY FEET AND SEEPING THROUGH CRACKS IN THE FLOOR YET STILL I KNELT AND DID NOT MOVE FOR FEAR SHED LET GO MY HANDS LET ME STAY I WANTED TO BEG PLEASE DONT MAKE ME GO
